entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I want to return a VeloBand Pulse I bought a little over two weeks ago. It's just not what I expected.
I understand. I'm happy to help you with your return. Can I get your order number, please?
It's #VF478923. Look, I don't have a lot of time for this. I hope this will be quick.
Thank you. One moment while I pull up your order... Okay, I see the VeloBand Pulse here. Regarding our return policy, you generally have 90 days to return items for a full refund.

Ninety days? Really? The guy in the store made it sound like I had almost no time at all! I was really stressing about getting this done. This smart watch is expensive, and I wanted to be sure I could return it if I didn't like it.
Yes, our standard return policy is 90 days. I apologize if there was any miscommunication in the store. Since you are within that window, your return is approved.
So, what do I do now? Just box it up and send it back?

Exactly. I'll email you a prepaid shipping label right away. Just pack the VeloBand Pulse securely in its original packaging, affix the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location. Once we receive the returned item, a full refund will be issued back to your original payment method. Please allow 7-10 business days for the refund to process.
Okay, great. And just to confirm, there are no fees or anything like that?
No fees at all. The return shipping is completely covered by us.
Wow, that's fantastic. I really appreciate it. The stress I was under thinking I was past the return window...Thank you so much! You've made my day.
You're very welcome! I'm glad I could help. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's everything. Thanks again!
You're very welcome! Have a great day!

As a note, some specialized products like the VeloBand Pulse have their own specific requirements outside of the standard 90 days, though the standard return policy was mistakenly referenced here. If you have any further questions you can speak to a manager.
